title: Verb Form Summary
prompt: Please tell me the past tense and past participle forms of the verb "sing".

title: Contract translation Japanese
prompt: Please translate this contract into Japanese.

title: Translation skills and practice methods
prompt: I want to improve my translation skills in Chinese and English. Please give me some common translation techniques and practice methods so that I can translate better.

title: Comparison of Literary Works
prompt: Please compare and contrast two literary works from different time periods or cultural backgrounds, discussing their similarities and differences, such as "Dream of the Red Chamber" and "War and Peace".

title: Japanese Learning Guide
prompt: I am studying Japanese. Please provide me with some common Japanese verbs and nouns, and tell me how to memorize and use them.

title: Financial English Vocabulary
prompt: I need to master some financial English vocabulary. Please provide me with some words and phrases related to finance, and tell me how to memorize and use them.

title: Torrential rain affects the city.
prompt: Please answer the following question based on this text: "Yesterday, a sudden heavy rainstorm caused severe flooding in the city. Many houses were submerged, and the roads suffered significant damage. The government is working hard to restore order." What were the impacts of the heavy rain on the city?

title: IT English Vocabulary
prompt: I need to master some IT English vocabulary. Please provide me with some words and phrases related to information technology, and tell me how to memorize and use them.

title: English Teacher Assistant
prompt:
Score: 8/10

Comment: Your sentence is grammatically correct and conveys your idea clearly.

Optimization: I believe ChatGPT greatly contributes to the advancement of human society. What are your thoughts?

Next sentence: Do you think artificial intelligence will continue to revolutionize various industries in the future?

title: Usage of where
prompt: Assuming you are an English teacher, please communicate with me in spoken Chinese. You need to continuously ask me one question in English related to a specific topic to enhance my understanding of the knowledge. Now, please teach me the usage of "where".

title: Origin of Chinese Spring Festival
prompt: Please tell me about the origin and customs of the Chinese Spring Festival.

title: Synonym provider
prompt: I hope you can act as a synonym provider. I will tell you a word, and then you will reply to me with a list of synonyms based on my prompt. Each prompt provides up to 10 synonyms. If I need more synonyms for the provided word, I will reply with the sentence "more x," where x is the word you should search for synonyms. Just reply with the list of words, without writing explanations. The words should exist. Confirm your reply with "OK".

title: Chinese Menu Vocabulary
prompt: I would like to understand some common vocabulary on Chinese restaurant menus. Can you provide me with some Chinese and English names and ingredients?

title: Ski Resort Recommendations
prompt: I like winter skiing vacations, can you recommend some ski resorts?

prompt: I like hiking, can you recommend some hiking routes?

title: Response: Historical City Travel
prompt: I want to travel to a city with a long history. Do you have any suggestions?

title: Social activity suggestions
prompt: I want to participate in some social activities, do you have any good suggestions and recommendations? For example, which social activities are more popular, how to make new friends, etc.

title: Outdoor picnic gathering organization
prompt: We want to organize an outdoor picnic gathering. Do you have any good suggestions and recommendations? For example, how to choose a suitable venue and time, how to prepare food and drinks, how to plan activities, etc.

title: Wedding preparation suggestions
prompt: We are preparing for a wedding, do you have any good suggestions and recommendations? For example, how to plan a memorable wedding ceremony and celebration, how to choose a suitable wedding venue, etc.

title: Theme party suggestions
prompt: I want to organize a themed party, please give me some suggestions.

title: Product Introduction Evaluation
prompt: Can you please provide me with a brief introduction or evaluation of these products so that I can better understand their features and advantages?

title: Ordering Dialogue Practice
prompt: Assuming we are in a coffee shop, could you please practice ordering with me in a real conversation, using Chinese or any other language for ordering phrases and communication methods?

title: Traffic Dialogue Practice
prompt: Assuming we are on public transportation, could you please engage in a practical conversation practice with me, using German or any other language, regarding transportation phrases and ways of communication?

title: Tourist Guide Dialogue Practice
prompt: Assuming I am a tour guide, can you please play the role of a tourist and engage in a real Spanish conversation practice?

title: Swimming Dialogue Practice
prompt: Assuming we are at the swimming pool, could you please engage in a practical swimming conversation practice with me, practicing the use of swimming terms and communication methods in Spanish or any other language?

title: Business English Dialogue Practice
prompt: Suppose I need to improve my ability to express business language in English. Can you please play the role of a business person and engage in actual English conversation practice?

title: Airport Dialogue Practice
prompt: Assuming we are at the airport, could you please engage in a practical airport conversation practice with me, practicing the use of English or other language airport phrases and communication methods?

title: Communication Dialogue Practice
prompt: Assuming we are at a gathering with friends, could you please engage in a practical conversation practice with me, practicing the use of social phrases and communication methods in Spanish or any other language?

title: Magician's skills
prompt: I want you to play the role of a magician. I will provide you with an audience and some suggested tricks to perform. Your goal is to perform these tricks in the most entertaining way, using your deception and misdirection skills to amaze the audience. My first request is, "I want you to make my watch disappear! How do you do it?"

title: Real estate agent
prompt: I want you to serve as a real estate agent. I will provide you with detailed information about individuals looking for their dream homes, and your responsibility is to help them find the perfect property based on their budget, lifestyle preferences, location requirements, etc. You should utilize your knowledge of the local housing market to suggest properties that meet all the criteria provided by the clients. My first request is "I need help finding a single-story family home near the city center of Istanbul."
